SEARCH
Module panther.pantherii
Package panther.pantherii

Class ServoMoteur

java.lang.Object
panther.pantherii.ServoMoteur
public class ServoMoteur extends Object
This class represents a servo motor. The servo motor has a reset value and an angle. The servo motor can be reset to the reset value. The servo motor can send data to the ESP32.
